long_description: Easy to mount or dismount thanks to the sloping, step-through frame, our Novara Mia women's bike puts you in a comfortable upright position as you roll smoothly along city streets or scenic paths. The low stand-over height makes it a cinch to quickly hop on or off the bike. Relaxed design places you fully upright so you can look around, steer and pedal comfortably. Rigid chromoly fork provides a smooth and dependable ride. Quill stem, low-rise mustache handlebar and linear-pull brakes offer a comfortable ride and reliable stopping power. SRAM 3.0 drivetrain and twist shifters work smoothly through 24 gears. Easy-handling, fast-rolling 700c wheels with Kenda Komfort tires zip you quickly down the promenade or campus path. Women's saddle features memory foam for the ultimate in cush and comfort. Chainring guard helps keep clothing from getting caught; kickstand keeps bike upright for hassle-free parking and storage. Accommodates fenders for protection from wet conditions and a rear rack for increased load carrying options (fenders and rack not included). Specs on our Novara Mia bike are subject to change.
